description:
The Self Confidence app helps you to be more comfortable with your body. It helps you to improve your self confidence in ALL ways.

This program helps you to overcome shyness, say the things you want to say, and to be more confident in every situation. This is a single session audio designed to create the strongest effect fast. It is also designed to be used cumulatively in order for you to become more and more confident the more you listen to it. It also helps you to eliminate shyness and with the opposite sex. It helps you have more confidence in every way. 

Also have apps for:Weight Loss, Smoking, Anxiety, Stress, and more.
